fields.job_description:
1. Partner closely with HRBPs and Hiring Managers to ensure sourcing and hiring strategies are aligned with TikTok people strategies.
2. Partner with business leaders and hiring managers to assess their talent requirements and fulfill hiring plans along with business timelines.
3. Use your established networks to discover, and attract experienced, diverse, ambitious talent to join our team.
4. Screen and select candidates effectively by assessing both their previous experience as well as culture fit with TikTok environment.
5. Lead key initiatives and projects with the Trust & Safety team, and other recruiting teams, that will continuously improve and scale our recruiting operations and results.
6. Provide an efficient and high-touch experience for every candidate from the application stage to offer, evaluating skill level, driving the interview process and offer process, including reference checks, salary recommendations and closing of candidates.
fields.job_requirements:
1. Strong communication and organisational skills.
2. Keen attention to detail, and experience in both building and executing recruiting processes.
3. Passionate about providing a great experience for all our candidates, whether they pass or not.
4. Entrepreneurial and creative problem-solving ability - you'll have lots of support but often have to figure out the solution yourself.
5. Experience closing senior and/or executive-level candidates and negotiating complex compensation packages.
6. Optimistic and collaborative - we're building an awesome team and looking for someone excited to roll their sleeves up and join us as we start this journey.

fields.job_description:
1. Enhance the people and workplace experience through localized people initiatives throughout the employee lifecycle, including process improvements, data & insights.
2. Provide support and knowledge to the business for the whole employee lifecycle. Continually, work on the enhancement of the employee lifecycle through process improvements, automation, data & insights.
3. Help scale various HR programs to create efficient and simple people processes, systems, policies, and programs.
4. Maintain partnerships with geographically distributed HRBPs, TA and other HR Operations team members.
5. Exercise independent judgment and discretion do determine appropriate actions or solutions to problems.
fields.job_requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above.
2. 6+ years of People Operations/Human Resources related experience.
3. Support employees and improve employee experience by providing end to end HR solution to solve their issues.
4. Actively educate employees and managers on how to stay within legal guidelines regarding on-the-job behaviour, investigate workplace violations, and respond to stakeholder queries though a combination of referring to internal experts, and/or interpreting both policies and changes to policy.
5. Strong business partnering skills and HR acumen, including problem solving skills, critical thinking abilities, coaching skills, project management & leadership abilities.
6. Analytical and problem-solving skills.
7. Player-coach role, with the experience of managing a small team.
8. High level of discretion, confidentiality, and ethics.
9. Humility, flexibility, good interpersonal & customer facing skills are a must.
10. Highly proficient and excellent communication skills in English.

fields.job_description:
1. Enhance the people and workplace experience through localized people initiatives throughout the employee lifecycle, including process improvements, data & insights.
2. Provide support and knowledge to the business for the whole employee lifecycle. Continually, work on the enhancement of the employee lifecycle through process improvements, automation, data & insights.
3. Help scale various HR programs to create efficient and simple people processes, systems, policies, and programs.
4. Maintain partnerships with geographically distributed HRBPs, TA and other HR Operations team members.
5. Exercise independent judgment and discretion do determine appropriate actions or solutions to problems.
fields.job_requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above.
2. 3+ years of People Operations/Human Resources related experience.
3. Familiar with labour/compliance laws and cultural nuances within Malaysia.
4. Experience with employee lifecycle (onboarding, transfers, performance cycles, leaves of absence and offboarding). 5. Support employees and improve employee experience by providing end to end HR solution to solve their issues.
6. Analytical and problem-solving skills.
7. High level of discretion, confidentiality, and ethics.
8. Humility, flexibility, and good interpersonal&customer facing skills are a must.
9. Highly proficient and excellent communication skills English.

fields.job_description:
Perform daily audit on internal system and videos by users.
Provide analysis of errors and feedback to respective team.
Work with Internal Training Team to align Policy understanding of QA and moderation teams.
Provide support on Policy/Quality related questions on ad-hoc basis.
Responsible in guiding new joiners in order to achieve Ramp up target.
Work closely with Operation Team in order to provide feedback on quality.
Identify potential failure of Policy Update and propose recovery plan in advance.
Conduct Quality meeting with the team to analyze errors.
fields.job_requirements:
Minimum Diploma in linguistics, mass communications, advertising, business administration, or any relevant field of studies.
Minimum 1 year working experience as Content Quality Assurance Analyst / Content Moderator would be an added advantage.
Experience in Content Moderation/Content Quality/Content Safety will be an added advantage.
Attention to details, able to handle various contents, multitasking, work under pressure, good interpersonal skills, team player, able to work independently. 
Ability to speak and read in Burmese is a must and able to converse in English.
Willing to be based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Working visa will be provided for Non Malaysian for suitable candidates

fields.job_description:
Review content on short-video platforms and conduct the content quality control in Southeast markets.
Make sure the contents comply with local policies, regulations and culture
Handle complaints and reports with respect to users and community
Interpret and apply complex policies and guidelines to content by understanding the review policies and guidelines
Identify improvement opportunities in workflow by using daily data analysis and suggest solutions
Analyze the risk level of incidents and assess the safety status of the community and products
Attention to details and ability to work differing 7*24 work rotations/shifts as required.
fields.job_requirements:
Minimum Diploma in linguistics, mass communications, advertising, business administration, or any relevant field of studies.
Minimum 1 year working experience as Content Quality Assurance Analyst / Content Moderator would be an added advantage.
Experience in Content Moderation/Content Quality/Content Safety will be an added advantage.
Attention to details, able to handle various contents, multitasking, work under pressure, good interpersonal skills, team player, able to work independently. 
Ability to speak and read in Thai is a must and able to converse in English.
Willing to be based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Working visa will be provided for Non Malaysian for suitable candidates

fields.job_description:
1. Responsible for monthly payroll activities such as collating and validating inputs, output and statutory payments.
2. With proven track record in providing high standard of payroll verification and checking skills.
3. Managing and improving payroll operations.
4. Experience in legal and compliance audits in payroll, such as income taxes, statutory social securities.
5. Effectively manage payroll vendors by strictly adhering to the contract and SLA.
6. Develop relationships with local authorities, not limited to Social Security, Tax, etc.
7. Partnering and work collaboratively with HR Business Partners, HR Operations team to elevate employee experience.
fields.job_requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree or above.
2. Hands-on, strong functional knowledge and a minimum of 3 years inhouse payroll operation experience.
3. Payroll and tax knowledge in Malaysia.
4. Strong vendor management and project management skills.
5. Strong influence and stakeholder management skills.
6. Excellent English and Malay.
7. Preferably with an added language.

fields.job_description: Manage and provide support to various reporting and experience analysis function.Manage the quarterly / yearly reserving workflow for timely submission to BNM.Communicate with various stakeholder to articulate necessary information and perform analyses to assist Appointed Actuary in preparing the Financial Condition Report (FCR).Perform internal capital modelling and present the results to regional office.Provide technical support to ICAAP stress test and prescribed stress test.Provide technical support to Reinsurance treaty team in managing annual reinsurance treaty renewal.Assist in managing the implementation of IFRS17 project.Assist in managing the preparation of quarterly experience study for various line of business.Other ad-hoc support as required.
fields.job_requirements: Qualified or Nearly Qualified Actuary under Casualty Actuarial Society (CAS) / Institute of Actuaries of Australia (IOAA) / Institute and Faculty of Actuaries (IFoA) or equivalent.Minimum five (5) years working experience in actuarial for General Insurance or related role.Well verse Knowledge in IFRS17, experience in SAS, ResQ and ReMetrica is an added advantage.Good understanding on actuarial principles.Good understanding on local regulatory requirements and General Insurance business or products.Project management experience with strong numerical and analytical skills.

fields.job_description: Responsible for the achievement of production of individual budget, team budget and portfolio mix.Recruitment and retention of agents.Maximizing business support from agents through regular servicing and visitations.Supervise and conduct training for agents and Marketing Officer.Provide marketing and technical support to agents and Marketing Officer.Gather market feedback on competitors’ activities.To ensure risk is in compliance with Underwriting Standing Order.Monitoring Underwriting results of agents.Collection of premiums in compliance with Credit Control Policy.Preparation of yearly budgets.Resolve and escalate operation issues emanating from agents.Managing document flow between agents and company.
fields.job_requirements: Degree in any discipline or professional certification in DMII/ AMII.Minimum Seven (7) years of working experience in relevant insurance industry.Successfully delivered on KPIs with proven track record in production, recruitment of agents and business development.Effective communication in writing, business presentation and interpersonal communication across various levels of seniority.

fields.job_description: Be a Business Partner to functions of the company to actively participate in identifying potential risks and providing timely recommendations and support business units to manage risks.Assists the Senior Manager in ensuring completion of Risk Management Initiatives.Ensure timely identification, assessment, measurement and monitoring of risks together with actionable mitigation plans.Execute the assigned Risk Management Initiatives which cover Risk Assessments, Risk Monitoring, Business Continuity Management, etc (especially on Technology related risks) efficiently and effectively.  The Initiatives are completed in all material aspects, assignments are well planned and executed as planned.Day-to-day focus includes consultative discussions with the business units in the resolution of the potential risks and issues.Promote risk awareness.Support the Chief Risk Officer/ Senior Manager in maintaining an open and effective working relationship with relevant stakeholders.Performs any other duties as assigned by the Chief Risk Officer/Senior Manager as and when necessary.
fields.job_requirements: Minimum a Bachelor’s Degree in Degree in Accounting, Actuarial, Finance or Risk Management.Professional qualifications related to accounting, risk management, internal control, actuarial and/or IT (i.e. ISACA).Minimum 6 years of experience in Risk Management, Risk Advisory, Internal Audit, External Audit, Finance, Actuarial or Compliance.Experience in IT risk/ audit background will be added advantage.Experience and knowledge in insurance background will be added advantage.Strong presentation skills in writing, business presentations and in interpersonal communication.Ability to multi-task.Strong business acumen and organisation awareness to be an effective Business Partner to various Business Units.Strong problem solving skills.

fields.job_description: Assess the Admission / Discharge case accordance to the Insurance’s policy terms and conditions.Ensure all the documents received are complete with info that required for Guarantee Letter (GL) issuance.Issue GL for the requests coming in via E-fax, dedicated e-mail from client and phone calls.Follow up with hospital on documents (breakdown bill, dosage of medication…etc) / reports for those incomplete documents cases.Calling hospital to confirm received on the Outpatient (OP) GL.Follow up with the sender if the documents received were incomplete.Result orientated with sense of urgency, co cooperativeness & eagerness in ensuring efficient teamwork in delivering excellent services to clientele.Responding to email enquiry received pertaining to admission and discharge.
fields.job_requirements: Diploma/Degree holders with 2 to 3 years working experience in Third Party Administration (TPA) / Insurance Industry (H&S) / Medical / Hospital. Candidate with knowledge in GHS / handling GL issuance is added advantage.Good communication skills.Good computer skills and meticulous with details.Must be able to read and write English & Bahasa Malaysia due to clientele portfolio.Has a pleasant disposition and clear intonation over the telephone.Able to work in fast paced environment, independent, customer focused, result oriented & disciplined.Willingness to work on shift / work as / when required.Possess own transport.

fields.job_description: Be responsible for and follow the agreed plan and timelines for Registration Projects to meet client and internal stakeholder objectivesMonitor and update the changes of regulatory affairs and government policies related to healthcare, and support the Regulatory Manager on Pharmacovigilance, and other regulatory affairs matter as necessaryEnsure continuous knowledge update on the registration process for Pharmaceuticals, Supplements, Generics, Medical Device and Cosmetics in MalaysiaWork closely with internal and external stakeholders (i.e. Pharmacovigilance, Marketing, Finance, Regulatory Authorities) to ensure all the responsibilities and agreed services for the clients are met.Understand and adhere to company’s regulatory affairs SOPFull understanding on the business models and key processes related to Zuellig Pharma’s operations and structure that will affect services and responsibilitiesSupport the Regulatory Affairs team for any regulatory affairs adhoc requests, not limiting to Product Review, Regulations, Guidelines.Promote and adhere to Zuellig Pharma’s core values when carrying out day-to-day responsibilities and interactions
fields.job_requirements: Knowledge of Regulatory Submission for Pharmaceuticals And Medical DevicesUnderstanding Regulations, Acts and Guidelines for Registration, GMP, GDP, PharmacovigilanceUnderstanding Licensing and Certification requirements for Company, Wholesale, Distribution and maintaining these licenses and certificatesUnderstanding advertising guidelines and requirementsMinimum Degree in Pharmacy or related fields.At least 3 years’ working experience in Regulatory Affairs and or related fields.Possession of a valid certificate of registration as a Pharmacist if applicable.Experience in dealing with Regulations and Enforcements within the laws of Malaysia for Pharmaceutical industry.Good Bahasa Melayu and English writing and communication skills.

fields.job_description:
Meet and exceed sales targets; achieve maximum sales in assigned territory through approved and allocated channels
Execute the commercial strategy in each of the assigned account / customer, to meet the objectives of sell in, sell out, distribution and share profitablyIncrease market share by promoting and selling products, communicate and present trade marketing programs and new products, conduct dealer/retailers training, and drive new customer developmentPlan and manage weekly/monthly work schedules with Business Manager to enable an efficient, effective work execution and achieve coverage and frequency targets (quantity & quality) and deliver agreed customer centric activities within operating budgetAchieve SFE KPIs and effectively utilize the relevant SFE software to maintain quality records and to report daily callsKeep abreast of competition, regulatory and market development, and update the information to the Company in a timely mannerContinuous improvement on the functional core competenciesEnsure compliance with the company policies and the local industry’s code of conduct to ensure that the company conducts business with integrityPromote and adhere to Zuellig Pharma’s core values when carrying out day-to-day responsibilities and interactions
fields.job_requirements: TECHNICAL COMPETENCYSelling skillPresentation skillProduct KnowledgePlanning & Organizing SkillProblem Solving Skill & Decision MakingStrong Communication Skills (Both Verbal and Written)MINIMUM JOB REQUIREMENTS EDUCATION:Graduate of Diploma/Degree in Marketing, Business Administration or relevant discipline.RELATED WORK EXPERIENCE:5PM / STPM or Certificate in Marketing with 2 - 3 years' experience in sales, preferably in FMCG, OTC/ Healthcare products or infant formula milk power or in nutritional products.Fresh degree holders are also encouraged to apply.

fields.job_description: Perform invoicing for clients and admin fee billingPerform closing for manual direct accounts for other clientsIssuance of debit and credit notes to clients and reimbursementAssist Account Receivable (AR) on collection of paymentsIssuance of official receipt, receipt vouchers and perform allocation of paymentManual entry for invoices along with posting and verificationAssist in monthly bank reconciliation for collectionsSorting and filling for invoices and collection documentations
fields.job_requirements: Diploma/Degree holders with 2 to 3 years working experience in Third Party Administration (TPA) / call centre and hospitality industry is added advantage.Good communication skills.Good computer skills and meticulous with details.Must be able to read and write English & Bahasa Malaysia due to clientele portfolio.Able to work in fast paced environment, independent, customer focused, result oriented & disciplined.Posses own transport.

fields.job_description: Process authorized Inpatient & Outpatient claims (GP, SP, Dental, Optical,Maternity and Wellness as within the requirement benchmarks (TAT).To interact and communicate with members on the procedures of Inpatient/Outpatient claims submission (e-Claims) and their turnaround time.Manage customer enquiries/complaints through email, e-helpdesk or written complaint and provide feedback/response within designated timeline.To investigate potential fraudulent claims and report to superior on claims irregularities involving corporate clients.Create Batch Numbers ad and prepares Claims submission listing.
fields.job_requirements: Minimum diploma/degree holder, preferable with minimum 2 years working experience.Candidate with medical insurance/nursing/medical science/hospital background will be added advantage.Pleasant personality with excellent interpersonal and organizational skills.Highly self motivated, energetic and persistent with good interpersonal and communication skills in English & Bahasa Malaysia language. Ability to speak in Mandarin/Tamil will be added advantages.Computer literate.Able to work in fast paced environment, independent, customer focused, result oriented & disciplined.Willing to work beyond normal office hours.Diligent, aggressive and productive performer.Having traits of Reliability, Empathy and Resourceful.

fields.job_description: Store StandardsPerforms cleaning duties.Ensure shelves are stock with products in line with planogram.Performs tasks (that improves/maintains store standards) as assigned by Store Manager.Provides customer service in line with 7-Eleven customer service standards.CompliancePerforms cashiering duties in line with Cash Handling & Loss Prevention policy.Performs CDU stock count.Performance accurate receiving/returns procedure in line with receiving SOPs.PeopleAssist SM/ASM to guide new staff in performing their day to day duties.CommercialObserves customer profile, store product assortment and performs/proposes accurate ordering.Diligently performs plus selling and promotion, sales building mechanics.Ensure minimal OOS at stores by performing accurate ordering and follows up with non-fulfilment.Ensure store compliance towards planogram.Ensure the promotion product/POSM being displayed accordingly.OthersPerform ad-hoc task instructed by SM/ASM.Any changes on JD based on company's instruction.
fields.job_requirements: Annual leaveMedical and insurance coverageEPF SOCSOUniform will be providedOpportunity for career advancement based on performance

fields.job_description: To negotiate best costing for product quote by supplier.To plan on future promotions, schedule of items to supply and displaying of inventory on gondola/shelf.To monitor on the sales progress and performance monthly; providing the monthly review of sales and gains.To work together with manager on upcoming events or planning of the particular department, monitor inventory turnover, sales performance and achievement.Liaise with local and overseas suppliers for product sourcing, developing and pricing requirements.Analyze pricing and negotiate with 5 Rs (Right source, Right price, Right quality, Right timing and Right quantity).Analyze market information to identify product trends/price trends/opportunities in order to develop competitive products/price to customers.Decorate the product layout, schematic plan and display of store.To perform any other work as and when required.
fields.job_requirements: Degree in Business/Marketing or equivalent.Minimum 2 years buying experiences in FMCG or retail line.Proficient in English and Bahasa Malaysia.Intermediate Excel and PowerPoint skills.Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision.Result-oriented, strong communication and interpersonal skills.Independent, outgoing, good public relations, pleasant personality.

fields.job_description: Manage the execution of proprietary brand campaigns.Co-ordinating and monitoring promotional campaigns with consumer activities / events.Provide creative thought leadership around the creation and rollout of monthly / seasonal A&P.Preparing and monitoring online and in-store marketing campaigns.Monitoring the division’s budget and expenditure as per pre-determined.Creation and publication of all A&P / PB material in line with pre-agreed plans.Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure Merchandizing and Operations objectives are comprehensively supported by the seasonal retail marketing plans.Monitor and report on effectiveness of A&P / PB initiatives by defining and implementing KPI metrics to collect accurate qualitative and quantitative ROI.To guide and monitor the team from campaign planning to execution and review that is aligned to timeline and budget.To execute and oversee any additional assigned duties / work scope as requested by the Manager and Head of Department.To assist in the administrative work.To perform any other work as and when required.
fields.job_requirements: Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Advertising/Media, Mass Communications, Marketing or equivalent.Possess 3 to 5 years of working experience in advertising agency or retail industry is required for this position.Experience in at least basic analytics and ability to prepare analysis report.Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (written and verbal).Strong PC skills especially Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Power Point).Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English

fields.position_title: Assistant Manager Internal Audit & Risk Management
fields.job_description: To undertake audit planning & fieldwork to ensure well documented working papers to support the audit conclusion and results.Review operating management processes to identify major risks & their mitigating controls via risk assessment tools such as Risk Management & Internal Control self-assessment Questionnaire.Recommend appropriate controls & value added measures to address the root cause of the control issues or to improve the operational efficiency.Prepare audit report and perform follow-up review to monitor the implementation of controls and process improvements.Assist in the planning & performance of monthly audit activities including special investigation, due diligence and forensic audit.
fields.job_requirements: Candidate must possessed at least a Bachelor Degree or professional degree in accounting & finance. Preferably a member of Malaysian Institute of Internal Auditors.      Well versed with Bursa Listing Requirement, guidelines of Securities Commission & Malaysian Code of Corporate Governance.Minimum of 4 years audit work experience from accounting firms & multinational companies.Good written & verbal communication skill.

fields.job_description: To manage the Data Center, Backup/Restore, Hardware, Operating System and Office Automation.Establishing and identifying the needs of application/users and monitoring application/user access and security.Define and align SEM requirement with System/Storage/Backup Infrastructure Service Level (SLA).Monitoring and managing Server, Storage and backup performance/load/availability and Cloud.Mapping out the conceptual design for a planned infrastructure architecture in outline.Design, Install, configure and testing new Server, Storage, backup and cloud.Proactively manage and maintain Server, Storage and backup standards, including adherence to the Data Protection Act.Troubleshoot System/Storage/Backup issues within the defined Service Level (SLA).Design and Implement monitoring, configuration management and reporting functions that will make a hands-off environment.Controlling access permissions and privileges.Developing, managing and testing back-up and recovery plans.Ensuring that server, storage, back-up and recovery procedures are functioning correctly.Capacity planning.Maintain Inventory and asset configuration documentation.Working closely with IT project managers, vendors, database and programmers.Communicating regularly with database administrator, applications and operational staff to ensure Server, Storage and backup integrity and security.Commissioning and installing new applications and customizing existing applications in order to make them fit for purpose.Carry out special tasks or ad-hoc tasks at Management’s direction.Assist PC, laptop and printer.Manage Data Center.Develop network security infrastructure solutions including financial analysis of technical alternatives to meet business requirements.Produce and maintain timely, accurate documentation to support implementation, operations support and quality/compliance requirements.The ability to provide clear and concise technical documentation that is understandable to both the technical community and senior management.A successful candidate will play a key role in ensuring routine system check. Monitoring security, resolving systems issue and to keep a good documentation.To perform any other work as and when required.Network or Server technical skillset is requiredKnowledge on Cloud environment.Require on standby during after working hours, public holiday and weekend.

technical documentation that is understandable to both the technical community and senior management.A successful candidate will play a key role in ensuring routine system check. Monitoring security, resolving systems issue and to keep a good documentation.To perform any other work as and when required.Network or Server technical skillset is requiredKnowledge on Cloud environment.Require on standby during after working hours, public holiday and weekend.

fields.job_description: Achieve forecast profits and sales of the designated product category.Product sourcing & development that suits the need of the market.Controlling stock levels based on forecasts for the season.Analyzing products & suppliers and execute next steps.Ensuring that best sellers are fully potentialsManaging space and range and product seasonality.Promotion planning and brand building.Gathering information relating to customer profile to products.Analyzing previous season's sales and reporting on the current season's lines.Visiting suppliers, factory and stores.Meeting with suppliers and managing the distribution of stock, possibly negotiating cost prices with suppliers.Identifying production and supply difficulties and dealing with them as and when they occur.Manage & training team member with succession planning.Identifying and resolve ordering system issues.To perform any other work as and when required.
fields.job_requirements: Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Business Studies/Administration/Management, Marketing or equivalent.Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English.At least 5 year(s) of working experience in the retail managerial environment is required for this position.Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision.Result-oriented, strong communication and interpersonal skills.Independent, outgoing, good public relations, pleasant personality.Preferably Managers specializing in Merchandising or equivalent.

fields.job_description: Serve as an internal trainer to conduct soft skills and leadership development workshops to enhance the competencies and capabilities of all staff.Conduct training needs analysis (TNA) to identify the training needs for all staff in meeting the behavioral competency gaps.Design and develop training calendar, training programme outline, structure and recommend learning solutions to close performance gaps and increase business value.Manage the overall training administration which includes training applications, HRDF claims, audit and etc.Analyse and evaluate effectiveness of learning and development solutions mainly in the area of soft skills training.Source and recommend training vendors and ensure sustainability of positive learning environment in delivering key learning objectives.Assist in planning and managing the yearly budgeting process, provide guidance to staff in setting the departmental budget and managing within the approved budget.Develop, implement, and ensure the end to end effectiveness of Orientation Program for all new employees.Work closely with relevant parties to drive e-learning initiatives.Actively support organisational development activities in meeting company’s development objectives.
fields.job_requirements: 5 – 6 years of working experience in learning & development or relevant field.Experienced in establishing an e-learning programme/patform will be an added advantage.

fields.job_description: To apply for regular renewal of  business licenses, permits, certificates and approvals from Government Bodies such as local authority, BOMBA, DOE, MCM, DOSH.To manage utilities items on the premises.To manage, review, monitor and record facilities part lifespan.To apply for any new permit and/or license as required by company from time to time.Responsible on the standardization for all facilities adjustment procedure.To liaise with the transporter company's representative about the arrival time and date of the motor vessel (ship)To attend a pre-operation meeting at the Port and provide a letter authorizing the discharging slag during drizzles on behalf of.To monitor the traffic of the lorries coming in and going out of our Premises during the discharging period of 3 to 5 days.To furnish a shipment analysis report to the General Manager for his information, based on our own Receiving and Dispatch report, the Draft Surveyor's report and the Shipping Agent's Statement of Facts.
fields.job_requirements: Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Engineering (Civil) or equivalent.At least 3 - 4 Year(s) of working experience in the facilities/building management is required for this position.Having experience dealing with government authorities (DOSH, DOE, BOMBA, MPPG) for all permits application and renewal matters Preferably Executive specialized in Engineering - Facilities Management.

fields.position_title: Customer Service Executive | Attractive Salary Package (Basic + Allowances)
fields.job_description: Delivering excellent customer service to customer via phone (inbound). This may be extended to other channels (email, live chat, social media) based on your skills.Providing accurate information on products and services to customer.Consistently meeting individual and team KPIS and goalsMaintaining high degree of integrity and confidentiality – keeping customers’ information confidential at all times.
fields.job_requirements: Must possess at least an SPM, Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree or higher, in any fieldsFresh graduates are encourage to applyGood command in spoken Mandarin is an additional advantageAbilities to read and write simplified and tranditional Mandarin are additional advantageGood command in English & Bahasa Malaysia in both spoken and writtenProper phone etiquette with excellent interpersonal and active listening skillsResourceful, proactive and able to work independentlyFast learner with good analytical thinking and problem solving skillsReady to work in shift rotations (AM/PM/Midnight shifts) based on business needsAble to work on public holidays and weekends (based on business needs)

fields.job_description: Managing and coordinating call centre day-to-day operation to fulfill Clients’ requirements and to deliver KPIs with the highest standards in accordance with the businees needs.To effectively manage call centre operation for constant performance achievements.Responsible for implementing policies, guidelines, processes, and procedures as well as areas of improvements for call centre operation.Headcount and capacity planning for call centre operation based on the requirements set by the Clients.Responsible in preparing reports and data analysing.Generating report from CRM system independently, proactively, and creatively, in order to store and manage database accordingly.Creating report templates, report filing and reports analysing which include customization and automation report to ease analysis and reporting processes, and to perform any ad hoc reports as required by the Clients.To identify relevant training needs for employees in developing their skills for internal growth.Planning for costing for new prospects and existing clients as required.Collaborating with other divisions and departments for the benefits to be gained within the call centre operation.Maintaining good relationship with the Clients in sustaining the business.Other ad hoc tasks as assigned by the higher level of management.
fields.job_requirements: Candidate must possess at least Diploma, Bachelor Degree or above with minimum 3.0 CGPAAt least 5 year(s) of working experience in Call Centre or BPO industry is required for this position, preferably Manager or Senior Supervisor positionsExcellent interpersonal and communication skillsGood command of spoken and written English and Bahasa Malaysia (Spoken Mandarin is an added advantage).Must be target-oriented person and willing to adopt to new working environmentMust possess strong analysis and reporting skills with advanced knowledge in Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint applicationsAbility to multitask and prioritize responsibilities
